text: Bulletin of Geography. Socio-economic Series (BGSS) is a Polish peer-reviewed quarterly scientific journal featuring articles on socio-economic geography and related disciplines. Founded in 2003 and published by Nicolaus Copernicus University (NCU) in Toruń. Its editor-in-chief is Professor Daniela Szymańska (NCU). The editorial work is supported by the Editorial Team. and the Advisory Council/Editorial Board. == Publisher == The publisher of all publications is Nicolaus Copernicus University in Toruń. BGSS publishes articles at no charge to authors and makes them available at no to readers. The journal provides open access content under a Creative Commons licence (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0). == Scope == The journal covers the following research areas: Cultural Studies (Q1), Demography (Q2), Urban Studies (Q2), Geography, Planning and Development (Q2/Q3). == Abstracting and indexing == The Journal is indexed in Scopus, Web of Science, Index Copernicus. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Scientific journals Category:2003 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Poland
title: Bulletin of Geography. Socio-economic Series
